data.text: Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, isenona
Ingʼeya sa ma abet piny nyaka sa ma aa malo;
Bende ingʼeyo yorega ma aluwo kod kuonde ma ayweyoe;
Kata kapok wach moro owuok e dhoga
Ilwora koni gi koni mi iketa diere;
Rieko ma kamano lichna miwuoro,
Dadhi kure eka apond ne Roho mari?
Ka aidho e polo, to in kuno;
Ka aidho yamb kogwen
to kata kuno bende lweti biro telonae,
Ka awacho niya, “Mudho biro ima adier
to in mudho ok timni mudho
In ema ne ichweyo dhanda maiye,
Apaki nikech ne ichweya mongʼith kendo malich miwuoro;
Fuonde mag ringra ne ok opondoni,
wangʼi ne oneno ringra ei minwa;
Mano kaka pachi tutna, yaye Nyasaye!
Ka dine bed ni anyalo kwanogi,
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, mad iyie ineg joma timbegi richo!
Giwuoyo kuomi gi paro marach;
Donge amon gi jomamon kodi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye,
Achayogi kendo aonge kodgi gi tich
Nona, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, mondo ingʼe chunya;
Tim kamano mondo ineane ka nitie gimoro marach kuoma,
